a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Generic chart title to silence errors
Figures correspond to various sources of information regarding public social expenditure as share of GDP. The
series 'OWID extrapolated' was constructed using the other series (see Source tab for details).
Source: Our World In Data based on OECD and Lindert (2004), OECD (1985), OECD (SOCX), Lindert_Historical (2004), Lindert_OECD_Old
